item.description:
Hello all,

Let's have a Memorial Day weekend potluck party and game night! Bring a classic picnic dish to share.Please let me know what you plan to bring.  BYOB and a camp chair. We'll have a fire in the firepit, cook marshmellows and make smores. :)

Parking logistics: Please do not park in the front I have people staying at my home and will need to get in and out of their spaces or the side of the house (cranky neighbors). On street parking, the CVS parking lot, the funeral home pr Law office parking lots across the street are popular choices among guests. :)

 

 I look forward to hosting some of you.

Take care,

Margaret
item.how_to_find_us: Follow the laughter - and read the signs on the door.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Memorial day weekend party at Margarrriiitttaaaassss
